channel.title: Spellbook Glitch
channel.description: Whenever you login on my server, you cannot open or use the spellbook unless you type ::home first. I am using a pwnscape source. Is there a fix for this problem?

item.title: Spellbook Glitch
item.dc:creator: @baba_mhillo baba mhillo
item.description:
@baba_mhillo wrote:

Whenever you login on my server, you cannot open or use the spellbook unless you type ::home first. I am using a pwnscape source. Is there a fix for this problem?
